title: Let's connect on steam!
description:
To connect, simply add me on Steam:
	 :bust_in_silhouette: [BOT Harold](https://steamcommunity.com/id/bot-harold/)
 and send me a message containing the private token. This connection request will automatically cancel itself in 15 minutes.

fields.name: privacy notice
fields.value:
None of your private data will be accessed or stored. I can only access as much data, as any of you other steam friends can.
People in discord servers may use commands to find out your CS:GO skill group, but you can toggle this with the `settings` command. This will be accessed:
	▸ Your CS:GO skill group / rank
	▸ CS:GO stats such as wins, defeats, K/D, number of shots fired, all of that interesting stuff.
